metatags.author: Alexander Turnbull, Nicolas Garriga and Elaine Ganley
metatags.og:title: 1 million march in France, unions call new pension protests
metatags.og:description: French unions called for new nationwide strikes and protests next week, coinciding with King Charles III's planned visit to France, after more than 1 million people demonstrated throughout the country Thursday against unpopular pension reforms.
